name: Southern Textiles 80JQ400KHT Solid Khaki 5-piece Daybed Ensemble

reviews.name: Southern Textiles Khaki Daybed Ensemble
reviews.reviewText:
Just wanted to say this pic is a little more tan khaki then what the cover really is, I wanted to keep it but it didnt leave the store I had to return it after pick up immed'. Its just too green for my colors and it didnt appear it on my monitor.
It does look made nicely tho' however it said dry clean only another no go.
I would say it is a good buy tho' made well looked great if you like fatigue green khaki :)
reviews.title: Army fatigue green / dry clean only!

reviews.name: Southern Textiles Khaki Daybed Ensemble
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with daybed ensemble. The color is really darker than in the picture, but true to it's description as khaki. The fabric is soft, the skirt manageable for adjustment to fit and cover the bottom hi-riser bed, although it does have to sit on the spring and be removed when you use the bed.
reviews.title: Khaki Daybed Ensemble

reviews.name: Southern Textiles Khaki Daybed Ensemble
reviews.reviewText: My bedding set did arrive on time, but I was very diasppointed in the quality of the product after the first wash. The batting (stuffing) inside of the comforter did not hold up to being laundered, the stuffing rolled between the fabric causing the comforter to fit poorly on the matress, it also seemed to have shrunken although it was washed in cold water, on delicate cycle using avery mild detergent. There was also a bit of fadding after being washed.
reviews.title: 02 October 2012

reviews.name: Southern Textiles Khaki Daybed Ensemble
reviews.reviewText: I could not find this anywhere at a resonable price. I assumed that it would not be that great but it is made well and should last the test of time. Much more than I anticipated. Very happy!!!
reviews.title: This was everything and more.

reviews.name: Southern Textiles Khaki Daybed Ensemble
reviews.reviewText: This set is very nice and would compliment any decor.
reviews.title: Great day bed comforter set.
